thread.title: Bill Maher: Trump and Russia Is ‘Worst Political Scandal in American History’
thread.title_full: Bill Maher: Trump and Russia Is ‘Worst Political Scandal in American History’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Bill Maher: Trump and Russia Is ‘Worst Political Scandal in American History’
text:
Bill Maher: Trump and Russia Is ‘Worst Political Scandal in American History’ by Josh Feldman | 10:48   
Bill Maher tonight started out his panel discussion by calling the issue of Russian connections to the White House “the worst political scandal in American history.” 
He dismissed the idea that the cover-up is worse than the crime and said, “No, the crime is worse. The crime is treason. The crime is colluding with Russia to fix an American election!” 
Malcolm Nance , who served in U.S. intelligence, agreed with Maher, while Larry Wilmore said there’s no way Barack Obama would have survived if all of these Russian dots surrounded him in 2008. 
Former Congressman Jack Kingston was the only one pushing back and he ended up clashing with Maher and the other panelists. 
Watch above, via HBO.
